name: Glacier Hop
description:
Glacier Hop pits  you against lonely, hostile snowmen in a desolate arctic wasteland.  Armed only with your jetpack and will to live, you must race against the elements as you attempt to hop from glacier to glacier to keep warm.

Your jetpack can be used to keep you warm and to keep you moving.

Readme from game:

Controls:
 Keyboard:
  W/S for leaning forward/backwards
  A/D for turning
  LMB to use jetpack
 
 Xbox Controller:
  Left stick for leaning/turning
  Right trigger for jetpack
The goal is to get as far as you can without dying.  Snowmen throw snowballs at you.  That is bad.  Do not get hit by snowballs.  Solid life advice.
Leaning forward while in the air speeds you up.  Leaning backwards slows you down.  If your jetpack gets too hot or too cold, you lose.
If you go underwater, you lose.  Do not go underwater.  Solid life advice.
If you hit the wall at high (or low) speeds, you lose.  Do not hit wall.  Solid life advice.
Enjoy
